name: Fatehaven
description: Combat, romance, adventure, and of courseâ€”magic! Master four elements and take on fate itself in this epic, interactive fantasy tale! Six possible endings. Four hours for a single playthrough. Three love interests. Countless choices. Male or female? Leader or loner? Good or evil? What kind of mage will you be?

reviews.review_text: Ten out of ten, ten out of ten, hundred out of hundred. Best game. B e s t g a m e.
Loved it, many options to choose from, and it really felt like i was in control of the story
Great story! Easily one of my fav Choice of titles. Did not see the ending coming at all. Lots of feels. Looking forward to playing the writters other games.
Separate the bloody speech from the rest of the text!
